name: Moments After
description:
You may need to zoom out depending on screen size and browser. On most browsers you can do this with CTRL and - . Please excuse this inconvenience. 

Moments After is a 2d top down adventure game made for the Global game game 2019. I participated in person at the IGDA Las Vegas location. I had a blast Gunnar Clovis was the organizer he did a fantastic job hosting and providing us with all our need... Carbs :P *!*  You can follow this link to see all the other games that got made at our location.

https://globalgamejam.org/2019/jam-sites/igda-las-vegas-unlv-international-gamin...

This is a game about a person who needs to get to work. Image yourself as this person what would you do on an ordinary day like this one?
